Title: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
Writer: René Goscinny (from the works of), Albert Uderzo (from the works of), Alexandre Astier (original story), Alexandre Astier (scenario and dialogue), Louis Clichy (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Christian Clavier, Guillaume Briat, Alex Lutz, Alexandre Astier
Plot: Getafix/Panoramix decides it's time to pass the magic potion recipe on to a young, trustworthy druid. He looks all over Gaul with Asterix and Obelix as Demonix is out to get the recipe.
